Pre-Game Insights: India, with two impressive wins in two games, are high on momentum and confidence.
India has a significant 19-11 lead over Australia in their T20I rivalry.
The match presents an opportunity for India to avenge their heartbreak from the 2023 ODI World Cup final.
Australia has a marginal advantage in AUSvIND matchups in ICC white-ball competitions (12-10).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be held at Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium, Gros Islet, St Lucia.
The match is scheduled for Monday, June 24, 2024, at 8 pm IST.
The article highlights key players like Jasprit Bumrah and Rohit Sharma for India, and Pat Cummins for Australia.
The article provides a statistical comparison of both teams, including most runs and most wickets in AUS vs IND T20Is.
